mapper.select: SELECT a.infoSex,a.infoTel,c.cName,b.pIdnum,b.pBirthplace,b.pAddress,b.pCno,a.infoName,a.infoAge,b.pInfo1,b.pInfo2,b.pInfo3,b.pInfo4 FROM tuserinfo a LEFT JOIN tparent b ON a.infoUser=b.pUser LEFT JOIN tcommunity c ON b.pCnum=c.cNum WHERE a.infoUser=#{username};

UPDATE tparent SET pBirthplace = #{3}, pAddress = #{1}, pCnum = #{10}, pInfo1 = #{6}, pInfo2 = #{8}, pInfo3 = #{7}, pInfo4 = #{9}, pNationality = #{5}, pBlood = #{4}, pEducational = #{2} WHERE pIdnum = #{0}
